channel.title: Firing tranquilizer gun crashes the game every time
channel.description: The tranquilizer gun that you need to get rid of the Ichthyosaur and is located in a shark cage crashes my game every time I try to fire it. minidump file is attached. hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_16T12_23_27C0.mdmp (91.5 KB)

item.title: Firing tranquilizer gun crashes the game every time
item.dc:creator: NadeDawg
item.description:
Okay, by making an effort to get r_drawviewmodel 1 to work, the crash problem got fixed along the way.

Everything works fine now, thanks for your help nonetheless.

Read full topic
item.source: Firing tranquilizer gun crashes the game every time

item.title: Firing tranquilizer gun crashes the game every time
item.dc:creator: NadeDawg
item.description:
Doesn’t help, it still crashes.

PS: In the meantime I found out the game also crashes if I try to use the RPG or Grenade Launcher …

item.source: Firing tranquilizer gun crashes the game every time

item.title: Firing tranquilizer gun crashes the game every time
item.dc:creator: vktech
item.description:
NadeDawg:

It only says hl2.exe stopped working.

Specs
Intel Quad Core Q6600 2.4GHz
Geforce GTX 470
Windows 7

Your specs are plenty good enough to run Black Mesa, but there are a few things I would try.

See if adding “-dxlevel 90” into the launch options (without quotes) works.

Read full topic
